name: UnlockEverythingMod
description: Unlocks Ascension 20 for original characters. Unlocks Daily & Custom. Unlocks all relics & cards in STS (excludes mod). Unlocks permission to be able to enter 4th Act. Unlocks beta art & The Ending in custom run. This Mod is almost One-Time-Affective, however usually players need to run game with this mod twice. If you are running the mod with a brand new save file, restart is required to unlock ascension for Ironclad.
